localizedMeta.description:
DIESER INHALT IST NICHT MIT Android™-GERÄTEN KOMPATIBEL.

SpinMaze ist ein Puzzle-Spiel, in dem die Welt dreht sich um Sie. Kombinieren Sie Ihren Verstand und Reflexe ausweichen Hindernisse und so schnell wie möglich das Ziel erreichen.
Verfügt über 50 vorgefertigte Levels, ein Endlos-Modus mit zufällig erzeugten Levels und 3 Schwierigkeitsstufen.

Paketgröße: 57 MB - Mehr Speicherplatz für die Installation erforderlich

Kompatibilitätsinformationen:
Anzahl von Spielern für lokales Spiel: 1 Spieler

Unterstützte Schnittstellen/Sensoren
- Touchscreen
- Controller/Bildschirm-Controller

Unterstützte Sprachen:
Deutsch/Englisch(USA)/Englisch(Großbritannien)/Spanisch/Französisch/Italienisch

Copyright 2015 ApplesauceJuice

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

SpinMaze is a puzzle game where the world revolves around you. Combine your wits and reflexes to dodge obstacles and reach the goal as quickly as possible.
Features 50 premade levels, an endless mode with randomly generated levels, and 3 difficulty settings.

Package size: 57 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
German/English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Spanish/French/Italian

Copyright 2015 ApplesauceJuice

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

SpinMaze is a puzzle game where the world revolves around you. Combine your wits and reflexes to dodge obstacles and reach the goal as quickly as possible.
Features 50 premade levels, an endless mode with randomly generated levels, and 3 difficulty settings.

Package size: 57 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:

SpinMaze is a puzzle game where the world revolves around you. Combine your wits and reflexes to dodge obstacles and reach the goal as quickly as possible.
Features 50 premade levels, an endless mode with randomly generated levels, and 3 difficulty settings.

Package size: 57 MB - More storage space required for install

SpinMaze is a puzzle game where the world revolves around you. Combine your wits and reflexes to dodge obstacles and reach the goal as quickly as possible.
Features 50 premade levels, an endless mode with randomly generated levels, and 3 difficulty settings.

Package size: 57 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
German/English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Spanish/French/Italian

Copyright 2015 ApplesauceJuice

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

ESTE CONTENIDO NO ES COMPATIBLE CON DISPOSITIVOS Android™.

SpinMaze es un juego de puzzle en el que el mundo gira a su alrededor. Combina tu ingenio y reflejos para esquivar los obstáculos y llegar a la meta lo más rápido posible.
Características 50 niveles prefabricados, un modo sin fin, con los niveles generados aleatoriamente, y 3 niveles de dificultad.

Tamaño del paquete: 57 MB. Se requiere más espacio de almacenamiento para la instalación

Información de compatibilidad:
Número de jugadores para juego local: 1 jugador

Interfaces/sensores compatibles
- Pantalla táctil
- Mando / mando en pantalla

Idiomas compatibles:
Alemán/Inglés(Estados Unidos)/Inglés(Reino Unido)/Español/Francés/Italiano

Copyright 2015 ApplesauceJuice

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

CE CONTENU N'EST PAS COMPATIBLE AVEC LES PÉRIPHÉRIQUES Android™.

SpinMaze est un jeu de puzzle où le monde tourne autour de vous. Combinez vos esprits et réflexes pour esquiver les obstacles et atteindre l'objectif le plus rapidement possible.
50 niveaux prédéfinis, un mode sans fin avec des niveaux générés aléatoirement, et trois niveaux de difficulté.

Taille du paquet : 57 Mo - Nécessite un plus grand espace de stockage pour l’installation

Informations sur la compatibilité :
Nombre de joueurs pour jeu local : 1 joueur

Interfaces/détecteurs pris en charge
- Écran tactile
- Manette / Manette à l’écran

Langues prises en charge :
Allemand/Anglais(États-Unis)/Anglais(Royaume-Uni)/Espagnol/Français/Italien

Copyright 2015 ApplesauceJuice

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

QUESTO CONTENUTO NON È COMPATIBILE CON I DISPOSITIVI Android™.

SpinMaze è un puzzle game in cui il mondo gira intorno a te. Combina il tuo ingegno e riflessi per schivare gli ostacoli e raggiungere il traguardo il più velocemente possibile.
Caratteristiche 50 livelli predefiniti, una modalità infinita con livelli generati casualmente, e 3 livelli di difficoltà.

Dimensioni del pacchetto: 57 MB - Spazio di archiviazione aggiuntivo richiesto per l'installazione

Informazioni sulla compatibilità:
Numero di giocatori per la riproduzione in locale: 1 giocatore

Interfacce/sensori supportati
- Touchscreen
- Controller / Controller su schermo

Lingue supportate:
Tedesco/Inglese(Stati Uniti)/Inglese(Regno Unito)/Spagnolo/Francese/Italiano

Copyright 2015 ApplesauceJuice

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
